price: ដោយពាក្យសំដីនេះ ធ្វើឱ្យមេឃជាច្រើនជាន់ស្ទើរតែបេ្រះ បែក និងផែនដីស្ទើរតែបែកខេ្ទចខ្ទី និងភ្នំទាំងឡាយស្ទើរតែរលំ រលាយ។
arabic: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرۡنَ مِنۡهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلۡجِبَالُ هَدًّا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: takādu al-samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min'hu watanshaqqu al-arḍu watakhirru al-jibālu haddan
